The Oblitercons/Shockwave:


Surging through the remaining foilage, in his large red tank mode, 
Firestarter fired a continous blast of flames at Stegotron.

---

In his artillery mode, Breakdown rolled forward.  Getting a lock, he fired a 
large explosive shell at Dark Mouse.

---

Scavenger drove over Ramhorn's charred body, a scraping heard as the tires 
(made out of a flexible strong metal) scraped against Ramhorn's body, the 
side cannons opening fire, twenty "bullets" in all from the cannons heading 
at Ultracon.

---

Hiss landed, firing three fusion blasts at Shockwave, the robot not belonging 
to any factions falling back as the blats cut into his abdomen.

---

Dark One flew overhead, bringing up his targeting computer.  Locking on, he 
fired a single missile at Dark Mouse.

---

Shockwave raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at Hiss, then 
charging off, retreating from the newly arrived reinforcments as he saw Hell 
Beast, Gremlin, Jackle, and Marine arrive.  "Logic dictates that I should 
leave immediately." Shockwave commented, transforming to space fighter mode 
and launching into the air.
